title: Athletics Ticket Office Internship - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Athletics Ticket Office Internship Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: Management of all ticket office responsibilities for Olympic sports; assisting with game-day management of mens and womens basketball; reconciliation of events; attend meetings...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
